mods.abstract: Message typed on envelope states evolution theory is incompatible with Biblical charge for man to \exercise... dominion over\ natural world.

titleInfo.title: Of Monkeys and Men: Public and Private Views from the Scopes Trial

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

titleInfo.title: Envelope from James Russell Clark to \The Associated Press and International News Service, c/o Judge John T. Raulston\
